editorialNotes.short: A huge range of cars and tons of tracks. Get stuck in!

ios.subtitle: Race and drive uphill to win!

name: Traffic Rider
artistName: Skgames Yazilim Muhendislik Teknoloji Ltd. Sti.

editorialNotes.short: Are you ready to rule the roads with your motorbike?

editorialNotes.tagline: Run, climb and swim to win

name: Traffic Driving Car Simulator
artistName: Abc Vietnam telecommunication services company limited

ios.subtitle: Crash other cars to be the one

editorialNotes.standard: A glistening stretch of rain-soaked pavement lies before you. Will you drift, draft or smash your way to victory? Whatever your style, this iconic street racer delivers hugely fun arcade action. Impressive graphics make every Subaru, Porsche and McLaren a sight to behold, and a vast lineup of events gives you plenty of ways to show opponents your taillights. Individual races are enjoyably brief, and we got swept up in blazing through them to unlock the most exotic cars and discover the next challenges.

editorialNotes.short: It's time to take your team to the top 🏎 🏁
editorialNotes.tagline: Take your team to the top

editorialNotes.standard: We love the chaotic whimsy of cute animals launching lightning strikes and sawblades to seize the lead in this auto-running racer.

name: CSR2 PvP Car Drag Racing Games

editorialNotes.tagline: Put the pedal to the metal
editorialNotes.standard: CSR knows how to supercharge a sequel. Drag-racing is as fun as ever—and you won’t believe how good it all looks. And now you can squash other players in Live Races, which is about as fun as it gets.
editorialNotes.short: Hit top speed and don't look back.

ios.subtitle: Luxury Car Buy and Sale Game
Build your vehicle for a race

editorialNotes.standard: With exciting events, famous characters and wild courses, Nintendo’s legendary kart-racing series burns rubber on mobile.
editorialNotes.short: Tour the world and race on tracks in cities around the globe.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: This stylish racer is full of visual wonders, plus licenced cars and an option-rich character creator.

editorialNotes.short: Join in a Hot Wheels crossover event

editorialNotes.tagline: Big trucks, big tyres, big stunts!

editorialNotes.standard: With its console-quality looks and streamlined controls, NaturalMotion’s gorgeous drag racer delivers a deep automotive experience. It starts with more than 85 world-famous cars, each ready to customize to perfection in your quest to rule the streets. From multiplayer matches to smoking rival racing gangs, new challenges wait around every corner. Best of all, CSR Racing's quick, intense contests fit into any gamer’s schedule.

ios.subtitle: Race off road on dirt and snow

name: Car games: drive car parking
artistName: Akarau: multiplayer games, online games & offline games
